Quick Access to WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Important

The latest release provides more streamlined access to the critical information small businesses need to know. Updates include:

Left Hand Toolbar Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Provides one-click access to usersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ data and transactions. With drag-and-drop customizability, shortcuts make it faster and easier to get around in QuickBooks.
New Home Page Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Offers home page access to a complete overview of company financials and important business insights. The redesigned experience provides a dashboard view of end-to-end company performance, no report running necessary.

Complete Tasks Quickly and Easily

Time-saving features include:

Centers Enhancements Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Users can complete tasks more quickly through reorganized customer, vendor and transaction centers. Access the memo field just like an invoice number to easily find transactions.
Sales Reps Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Track sales repsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ performance, whether they are employees or outside vendors. Business owners can assign sales reps to customers, run reports by sales rep, track top performers and calculate commissions.

The new income tracker provides an end-to-end view of all income-related transactions in one place. They may also batch print or email transactions directly from the income tracker and filter by transaction or customer.
